column2: Armstrong Flooring, Inc. engages in the production of flooring products. The company is headquartered in Lancaster, Pennsylvania and currently employs 1,700 full-time employees. The firm designs, manufactures, sources and sells resilient products in North America and the Pacific Rim. The company operates Resilient Flooring segment.The Resilient Flooring segment designs, manufactures, sources and sells a range of floor coverings primarily for homes and commercial buildings under various brands, including the Armstrong brand. The company sells products through independent wholesale flooring distributors re-selling its products to retailers, builders, contractors, installers and others.
